quote: If you are going to achieve excellence in big things, you develop the habit in little matters. – Colin Powell
fact: The shape of plant collenchyma’s cells and the shape of the bubbles in beer foam are the same - they are orthotetrachidecahedrons.
joke: Want to hear my pizza joke? Never mind, it's too cheesy.
